snippet: Mr. Batiste, a fixture on the New Orleans music scene known as Uncle Lionel Batiste, was also the face of the Treme neighborhood’s bicentennial.
abstract: Lionel Batiste, drummer in the Treme Brass Band and fixture on the New Orleans music scene, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Batiste, a fixture on the New Orleans music scene known as Uncle Lionel Batiste, was also the face of the Treme neighborhood’s bicentennial.

headline.seo: Lionel Batiste, Drummer in Treme Brass Band, Dies at 81
headline.main: Lionel Batiste, Drummer in Treme Brass Band, Dies at 81
headline.print_headline: Lionel Batiste, 81, Drummer in Treme Band
